Class Game

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game​(int height,
            int width,
            int playerCount)
        Initilizes a new Simulated Spe-ed Game.
        Parameters:
        height - height of the Board
        width - widht of the Board
        playerCount - number of Simulated Players

    • Method Detail

      • startSimulation

        public List<GameStep> startSimulation()
        Starts the simulated Game.
        Returns:
        initial GameStep for each SimulationPlayer

      • setAction

        public List<GameStep> setAction​(int playerId,
                                PlayerAction action)
        Applies an action to a SimulationPlayer. The player dies if this is the second action action in the same round. When all Players applied an action action, a new round will start.
        Parameters:
        playerId - the Players Id (1 - 6)
        action - the action to be applied
        Returns:
        the next Game-State, if all Players sent an action for this round. Else null

      • generateGameSteps

        private List<GameStep> generateGameSteps()
        Generates for each SimulationPlayer a gameStep object.
        Returns:
        a List of GameSteps

      • updateGameState

        private void updateGameState()
        Applies the did steps to the Board, processes collisions and increse round.

      • applyPassedSteps

        private void applyPassedSteps​(SimulationPlayer player,
                              Point2i oldPosition,
                              HashMap<Point2i,​Integer> passedCellsThisRound)
        Applies the last steps from a SimulationPlayer to the Board. The SimulationPlayer dies, if he causes a collision.
        Parameters:
        player - the player whose steps are to be applied
        oldPosition - the players position at the start of this round
        passedCellsThisRound - Cells that have already been used by a player in this round

      • getPassedSteps

        private List<Point2i> getPassedSteps​(Point2i positionA,
                                     Point2i positionB)
        Calculates the passed Cells between two positions.
        Parameters:
        positionA - the first position
        positionB - the second position
        Returns:
        the passed cell positions (Jumped over cells are excluded)

      • setCell

        private CellValue setCell​(Point2i point,
                          int playerId)
        Sets a Board Cell with a value (playerId) and returns the new value.
        Parameters:
        point - The Point2i to set
        playerId - The new playerId to set
        Returns:
        The actual new value
